Hero.subtitle: Manages your emails, runs your calendar, tracks expenses, posts on social media ‚Äî all from a simple text message on Telegram.
Hero.subtitleSecondary: No coding. No API keys. No surprise bills. Just pick a warrior and start chatting.

ChatDemo.userMsg1: Hey Mia, check my Gmail and summarize anything urgent
ChatDemo.botMsg1: On it! You have 3 unread emails. One urgent: your flight to Orlando was changed to 6:15 AM. Want me to update your calendar and set an earlier alarm?
ChatDemo.userMsg2: Yes please, and order me an Uber for 4:30 AM
ChatDemo.botMsg2: Done ‚úì Calendar updated, alarm set for 4:00 AM, and Uber scheduled for 4:30 AM to AUS airport. Anything else?

Integrations.label: INTEGRATIONS
Integrations.title: Works With Apps You Already Use
Integrations.subtitle: Your warrior connects to 50+ apps. No setup wizards. Just tell it what you need.
Integrations.moreApps: + Uber, Todoist, Whoop, Obsidian, WordPress, and 30 more via OpenClaw skills
Integrations.trustLine: Every integration uses encrypted OAuth ‚Äî your credentials never touch our servers.

ValueProps.label: WHAT IT ACTUALLY DOES
ValueProps.title: One Chat. Everything Handled.
ValueProps.inbox_desc: Reads emails, drafts replies, unsubscribes from junk, and flags what matters.
ValueProps.inbox_example: "Hey, summarize my unread emails and draft a reply to the one from my landlord"
ValueProps.calendar_desc: Schedules meetings, sends reminders, and warns you about conflicts ‚Äî before you even ask.
ValueProps.calendar_example: "Move my Thursday meeting to Friday and let the team know on Slack"
ValueProps.shopping_desc: Finds the best price, tracks deals, applies coupons, and monitors price drops.
ValueProps.shopping_example: "Find me the best deal on AirPods Max and alert me if they drop below $400"
ValueProps.social_desc: Drafts posts, suggests content ideas, schedules uploads, and tracks engagement.
ValueProps.social_example: "Write 5 Instagram caption ideas for my new product launch"
ValueProps.money_desc: Monitors expenses, categorizes receipts, and gives you a weekly spending summary.
ValueProps.money_example: "How much did I spend on food this month? Show me a breakdown"
ValueProps.control_desc: Plays music, orders rides, sets alarms, and connects your smart home ‚Äî all from chat.
ValueProps.control_example: "Play my chill playlist on Spotify and save my meeting notes to Apple Notes"

HowItWorks.label: GETTING STARTED
HowItWorks.title: Live in 3 Minutes. Seriously.
HowItWorks.step1_desc: Choose a personality that fits your vibe ‚Äî work mode, creative, no-nonsense, or chill.
HowItWorks.step2_desc: One tap. Your warrior goes live in your favorite messaging app instantly.
HowItWorks.step3_desc: Text your warrior like a friend. It handles the rest ‚Äî emails, calendar, research, anything.

Testimonials.t1_text: Everything Siri was supposed to be. And it goes so much further.
Testimonials.t3_text: Named him Jarvis. Daily briefings, calendar checks, reminds me when to leave for pickleball.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.section1_body1: When you create a ClawWarriors account, we collect your email address and encrypted password. When you connect a messaging channel (Telegram or WhatsApp), we store the channel identifier needed to route messages between you and your warrior.
Privacy.section1_body2: We also collect message content sent between you and your warrior to provide conversation context and improve the experience. Messages are stored securely and associated with your account.
Privacy.section2_item1: Provide and maintain the ClawWarriors service
Privacy.section2_item2: Route messages between you and your AI warrior
Privacy.section2_item3: Maintain conversation context for personalized responses
Privacy.section2_item6: Improve our service and develop new features
Privacy.section3_intro: We use the following third-party services:
Privacy.section3_item1: NVIDIA NIMs (Kimi K2.5) ‚Äî AI model provider for generating warrior responses
Privacy.section3_item2: Telegram Bot API ‚Äî Messaging channel integration
Privacy.section3_body: These services have their own privacy policies. Message content is transmitted to our AI provider to generate responses. We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
Privacy.section4_body: Your data is stored on secure servers. Passwords are hashed using bcrypt. We use HTTPS for all data transmission. While we implement reasonable security measures, no internet transmission is 100% secure.
Privacy.section5_body: We retain your account data and message history for as long as your account is active. You can request deletion of your account and associated data by contacting us or using the account deletion option in your settings.
Privacy.section7_body: If you have questions about this privacy policy or your data, contact us at

Chat.emptyHint: Type a message below or chat on Telegram ‚Äî it all shows up here.

SocialProof.quote: It replaced 3 apps for me in a week

Trust.label: TRUST & SAFETY
Trust.title: You're In Control. Always.
Trust.data1: Encrypted storage ‚Äî your messages are protected at rest and in transit
Trust.data2: We never sell your data to third parties ‚Äî period
Trust.data3: Delete your account and all data anytime from Settings
Trust.data4: HTTPS everywhere ‚Äî every connection is encrypted end-to-end
Trust.rules1: Cancel your subscription anytime ‚Äî no questions asked
Trust.rules2: No lock-in contracts ‚Äî leave whenever you want
Trust.rules3: Full data export ‚Äî take your conversation history with you
Trust.rules4: Transparent pricing ‚Äî what you see is what you pay

FAQ.label: FAQ
FAQ.title: Common Questions
FAQ.a1: Yes. All data is encrypted at rest and in transit. We never sell your information to third parties. You can delete your account and all associated data anytime from your settings page.
FAQ.q2: Do I need to share my API keys?
FAQ.a2: No. ClawWarriors handles all the infrastructure ‚Äî AI models, servers, and integrations. You never need to create or manage API keys. Just pick a warrior and start chatting.
FAQ.a3: Absolutely. There are no lock-in contracts. Cancel from your settings page and your subscription ends at the current billing period. No cancellation fees, no questions asked.
FAQ.q4: What apps does it work with?
FAQ.a4: Your warrior connects to 50+ apps including Gmail, Google Calendar, Spotify, Notion, Slack, and more. New integrations are added regularly through OpenClaw skills.
FAQ.a5: After your 7-day trial, the service pauses ‚Äî there's no automatic charge. You can upgrade to Pro anytime to continue, or start a new trial. Your data stays safe.

FinalCta.title: Ready to Deploy Your Warrior?
FinalCta.subtitle: 7-day free trial. No credit card required. Cancel anytime.

Glossary.warrior: A personalized AI agent you deploy to Telegram. Each warrior has a unique personality, memory, and skills.
Glossary.soulForge: Your warrior's personality config. Six fields that control how your warrior talks, behaves, and what it knows about you.
Glossary.deepMemory: Long-term memory that persists across conversations. Your warrior automatically remembers facts, preferences, and instructions you share.
Glossary.pulseCheck: Scheduled proactive messages from your warrior. It reaches out at set times without you having to ask.
Glossary.standingOrders: Automated recurring tasks your warrior runs on a schedule ‚Äî like checking your email every morning.
Glossary.openClaw: The AI infrastructure powering ClawWarriors. Handles models, servers, and integrations so you don't have to.
Glossary.class: Your warrior's archetype. Each class (Guardian, Scholar, Creator, Strategist, Sentinel) has different strengths and default personality.
Glossary.guardian: Focused on protection, precision, and loyalty. Great for daily management, scheduling, and keeping you organized.
Glossary.scholar: Focused on wisdom, patience, and clarity. Great for research, learning, and deep analysis.
Glossary.creator: Focused on creativity, strategy, and momentum. Great for content creation, brainstorming, and writing.
Glossary.strategist: Focused on precision, speed, and depth. Great for coding, automation, and technical tasks.
Glossary.sentinel: Focused on analysis, speed, and instinct. Great for data analysis, monitoring, and pattern recognition.
Glossary.tier: Your subscription level: Trial (free, 7 days), Pro ($30/mo), or Pro Tribe ($50/mo, 3 warriors).
Glossary.skill: An app integration your warrior can use ‚Äî like Gmail, Google Calendar, or Notion. Connected through OpenClaw.
Glossary.gateway: Your warrior's connection to external apps. The OpenClaw gateway routes requests between your warrior and third-party services.
Glossary.tone: How your warrior communicates ‚Äî formal, casual, playful, or technical. Set in the Soul Forge.
Glossary.vault: Secure encrypted storage for your personal API keys. Bring your own keys for maximum privacy and control.

Support.hubSubtitle: Everything you need to know about ClawWarriors
Support.whatIsBody:
ClawWarriors is a no-code platform for deploying personalized AI agents. Instead of generic chatbots, you choose an RPG-style warrior character that becomes your personal AI assistant.

Your warrior lives on messaging platforms like Telegram and can help with everything from daily planning to research to creative brainstorming.

Each warrior has a unique personality class (Guardian, Scholar, Creator, Strategist, or Sentinel), persistent memory across conversations, customizable behavior through the Soul Forge, and the ability to run automated tasks on a schedule.

Think of it as your own AI companion that actually knows you and works the way you want.
Support.choosingWarriorBody:
When you sign up, you'll choose a warrior from 5 personality classes, each with 3 character options:

Guardian ‚Äî Focused on health, wellness, and daily routines. Great as a personal wellness coach.

Scholar ‚Äî Built for research, learning, and analysis. Your personal research assistant.

Creator ‚Äî Oriented toward writing, ideas, and creativity. Your creative partner.

Strategist ‚Äî Specializes in planning, strategy, and problem-solving. Your strategic advisor.

Sentinel ‚Äî Expert in security, monitoring, and protection. Your digital watchdog.

Each warrior within a class has a distinct personality and speaking style. Browse the character cards during onboarding ‚Äî you can read their intro quote and see their stat distribution.

Pro Tribe users can deploy up to 3 warriors simultaneously, each on a different channel.
Support.connectTelegramBody:
After deploying your warrior, you'll need to connect a messaging channel. Here's how to connect Telegram:

1. Open Telegram and search for @ClawWarriorsBot
2. Tap 'Start' to begin the conversation
3. On the ClawWarriors website, go to the channel connection page
4. Click 'Generate Code' to get a 6-digit connection code
5. Send that code to @ClawWarriorsBot in Telegram
6. You'll see a confirmation message once connected

The connection is instant ‚Äî once linked, any message you send to the bot goes directly to your warrior, and responses come back through the same chat.

You can disconnect and reconnect channels at any time from your dashboard settings.
Support.firstConvoBody:
Once your warrior is deployed and your channel is connected, just send a message in Telegram to start chatting.

Your warrior will respond in character, using its personality class and tone. Here are some tips for your first conversation:

Introduce yourself ‚Äî Tell your warrior your name, what you do, and what you're looking for help with. This gets stored in Deep Memory.

Be specific ‚Äî Instead of 'help me be productive', try 'I need help organizing my morning routine as a freelance designer'.

Set expectations ‚Äî Tell your warrior how you prefer communication: casual or formal, brief or detailed, encouraging or direct.

Explore features ‚Äî Ask your warrior what it can do. It knows about its own capabilities.

Your warrior remembers information across conversations, so the more you chat, the more personalized it becomes.
Support.soulForgeBody:
The Soul Forge lets you shape your warrior's personality with custom instructions. Think of it as a set of rules your warrior always follows.

To access it, go to Dashboard and tap the Soul button.

The Soul Forge has 6 structured fields:

Personality & Tone ‚Äî How your warrior communicates. Example: 'Be warm and encouraging, use casual language, add humor when appropriate.'

User Context ‚Äî Background about you. Example: 'I'm a 28-year-old product designer based in Lisbon. I work remotely for a startup.'

Goals & Priorities ‚Äî What you're working toward. Example: 'Launching my freelance business, learning Portuguese, running a half marathon.'

Communication Preferences ‚Äî How you want responses. Example: 'Keep responses under 200 words. Use bullet points for lists. Ask follow-up questions.'

Do's ‚Äî Things your warrior should always do. Example: 'Always suggest next steps. Remind me of deadlines. Celebrate small wins.'

Don'ts ‚Äî Things your warrior should never do. Example: 'Never be condescending. Don't use corporate jargon. Never recommend meditation.'

Each field accepts up to 500 characters. Changes take effect immediately ‚Äî your warrior uses the updated instructions in the very next message.

Available on Pro and Pro Tribe plans.
Support.deepMemoryBody:
Deep Memory gives your warrior the ability to remember important facts about you across every conversation.

How it works:
After each conversation, your warrior automatically extracts key information ‚Äî preferences, facts about your life, standing instructions, and conversation summaries. These are saved and injected into every future conversation.

Memory categories:
- Preferences: Things you like or dislike, communication style
- Facts: Personal details, context about your life and work
- Instructions: Standing orders ('always do X', 'never do Y')
- Summaries: Key takeaways from past conversations

Viewing your memories:
Go to Dashboard and tap the Memory button to see everything your warrior remembers. Memories are listed with their category, date, and source.

Managing memories:
You can delete individual memories or clear all memories at once. Deleting a memory means your warrior will no longer reference that information.

Memory limits by plan:
- Trial: 50 memories
- Pro: 200 memories
- Pro Tribe: 500 memories per warrior
Support.pulseCheckBody:
Pulse Check lets your warrior reach out to you proactively at scheduled times, instead of only responding when you message first.

Four built-in pulse slots:

Morning Check-in (8:00 AM) ‚Äî A brief start-of-day message, referencing anything relevant from memory.

Midday Nudge (12:00 PM) ‚Äî A midday check-in, asking if you need help or sharing a useful tip.

Evening Wrap-up (5:00 PM) ‚Äî An end-of-day summary of what you worked on and anything pending.

Night Wind-down (9:00 PM) ‚Äî A casual evening message with a thought or recommendation.

Setup:
1. Go to Dashboard and tap the Pulse button
2. Set your timezone (auto-detected from your browser)
3. Toggle each pulse on or off
4. Customize the prompt for each pulse ‚Äî tell your warrior what to say
5. Use the Test Now button to preview what it sends

Pulse messages arrive through your connected messaging channel (Telegram).

All times are in your local timezone.

Trial users get 1 pulse slot. Pro users get all 4. Pro Tribe users get all 4 per warrior.
Support.warRhythmsBody:
War Rhythms are automated recurring tasks that your warrior executes on a schedule. Unlike Pulse Check (which sends check-in messages), Rhythms are task-focused ‚Äî your warrior performs a specific job and reports the result.

Examples:
- 'Summarize my week every Friday at 5pm'
- 'Research the latest AI news every Monday morning'
- 'Remind me about my goals every Wednesday'

Creating a rhythm:
1. Go to Dashboard and tap the Rhythms button
2. Tap 'Add Rhythm'
3. Enter a name and the task instructions
4. Type a schedule in natural language (e.g., 'every weekday at 9am')
5. The AI converts it to a precise schedule and shows you a preview
6. Tap 'Create Rhythm'

Suggested rhythms:
The page also shows personalized suggestions based on your conversation patterns and memories. Tap 'Show Suggestions' to see them, and 'Add' to create one instantly.

Managing rhythms:
- Toggle rhythms on/off with the switch
- 'Run Now' triggers immediate execution
- View the last result in the expandable section
- Delete rhythms you no longer need

Trial: 0 rhythms (Pro required)
Pro: Up to 5 rhythms
Pro Tribe: Up to 15 rhythms
Support.vaultBody:
The Vault provides AES-256-GCM encrypted storage for your personal API keys. This powers the Bring Your Own Key (BYOK) feature.

What BYOK means:
Instead of using the platform's AI credits, you can store your own API key in the Vault. When your warrior makes AI calls, it uses your key instead ‚Äî giving you full control over your AI usage and billing.

How it works:
1. Go to Dashboard and tap the Vault button
2. Tap 'Add Key'
3. Enter a label (e.g., 'My NVIDIA Key'), select the type, and paste your API key
4. Optionally set an expiry date
5. Your key is encrypted immediately ‚Äî even we can't read it

Security details:
- Keys are encrypted with AES-256-GCM (military-grade encryption)
- Each key gets a unique initialization vector (IV)
- Auth tags verify data integrity
- Keys are only decrypted at the moment of use
- The list view only shows a masked preview (e.g., 'nvapi-...xyz')

Key limits by plan:
- Trial: 0 keys (Pro required)
- Pro: Up to 5 keys
- Pro Tribe: Up to 10 keys
Support.questBody:
WarriorQuest is a gamified progression system that rewards you for using the platform's features.

How it works:
As you use ClawWarriors, you automatically complete quests and earn XP (experience points). XP accumulates to unlock new levels and tier ranks.

Tier progression:
- Recruit (Level 1-2): You're just getting started
- Apprentice (Level 3-5): You've learned the basics
- Warrior (Level 6-8): You're an experienced user
- Commander (Level 9-10): You've mastered the platform

Example quests:
- First Steps (deploy your first warrior)
- Voice Shaper (customize your Soul Forge)
- Memory Keeper (accumulate 10+ memories)
- Rhythm Master (create 3 active rhythms)
- Identity Forged (set a custom warrior name)

Your current level and XP progress are shown on your warrior card in the dashboard. The next quest to complete is highlighted in the quest nudge banner.

Quests complete automatically ‚Äî no manual claiming needed.
Support.classesBody:
ClawWarriors offers 5 distinct personality classes, each designed for different use cases:

Guardian
Focused on: Health, wellness, daily routines
Best for: Personal wellness coaching, habit tracking, daily check-ins
Stats: High Protection and Loyalty, moderate Precision

Scholar
Focused on: Research, learning, analysis
Best for: Research assistance, study help, information synthesis
Stats: High Analysis and Depth, moderate Recall

Creator
Focused on: Writing, ideas, creativity
Best for: Brainstorming, content creation, creative projects
Stats: High Imagination and Flow, moderate Craft

Strategist
Focused on: Planning, strategy, problem-solving
Best for: Project planning, decision-making, goal setting
Stats: High Foresight and Logic, moderate Adaptability

Sentinel
Focused on: Security, monitoring, protection
Best for: Security awareness, risk assessment, monitoring tasks
Stats: High Vigilance and Accuracy, moderate Stealth

Each class has 3 warrior characters with unique names, personalities, and speaking styles. Your warrior class affects the default behavior and tone, but you can further customize everything through the Soul Forge.
Support.webSearchBody:
Your warrior has a built-in web search capability that lets it access current, real-time information from the internet.

How it works:
When you ask your warrior about recent events, current prices, latest news, or anything that requires up-to-date information, it automatically decides whether to search the web.

You don't need to do anything special ‚Äî just ask naturally:
- 'What's the weather like in Lisbon today?'
- 'Find me the latest news about AI regulation'
- 'What's the current price of Bitcoin?'

The AI model (powered by Kimi K2.5) handles web search internally and incorporates the results into its response.

Web search is available on all plans, including trial.
Support.plansBody:
ClawWarriors offers three plan tiers:

Trial (Free, 7 days)
- 1 warrior
- 1 messaging channel
- Deep Memory (50 memories)
- 1 Pulse Check slot
- Web search included
- Full feature preview

Pro ($30/month)
- 1 warrior
- 1 messaging channel
- Deep Memory (200 memories)
- Soul Forge customization
- 4 Pulse Check slots
- Up to 5 War Rhythms
- The Vault (5 keys)
- Web search included

Pro Tribe ($50/month)
- Up to 3 warriors
- Multiple messaging channels
- Deep Memory (500 memories per warrior)
- Soul Forge customization
- 4 Pulse Check slots per warrior
- Up to 15 War Rhythms
- The Vault (10 keys)
- Web search included

All plans include the full AI engine with intelligent 3-tier model routing. Upgrade or downgrade anytime from the Upgrade page.
Support.subscriptionBody:
Your subscription is managed through Stripe, a secure payment processor.

To manage your subscription:
1. Go to Settings
2. Under 'Subscription', click 'Manage Subscription'
3. This opens the Stripe Customer Portal where you can:
   - Update your payment method
   - View billing history
   - Change your plan
   - Cancel your subscription

If you cancel, your plan remains active until the end of your current billing period. After that, you'll be downgraded and your warrior will stop responding until you resubscribe.

Note: Cancellation doesn't delete your data. Your warriors, memories, and settings are preserved. If you resubscribe, everything picks up where you left off.
Support.settingsBody:
Access your account settings from the Settings page (gear icon in the navigation).

Available settings:

Profile:
- View your email address
- See your current plan and tier

Password:
- Change your password (requires current password)
- Not shown for Google-only accounts

Subscription:
- View current plan details
- Manage subscription through Stripe portal
- Upgrade or downgrade

Account:
- Delete your account (permanent, requires confirmation)
- This removes all warriors, memories, messages, and settings

Connected channels are managed from the Channel page during onboarding, or by messaging the bot directly.
Support.notRespondingBody:
If your warrior isn't responding to messages, try these steps:

1. Check your channel connection:
   - Go to Dashboard and check that your channel shows as connected
   - If disconnected, generate a new code and reconnect

2. Check your plan status:
   - Trial expired? Your warrior stops responding until you upgrade
   - Go to the Upgrade page to choose a plan

3. Reset the gateway:
   - On your Dashboard, click 'Reset Gateway'
   - This clears the connection cache and restarts the message pipeline

4. Wait a moment:
   - AI responses can take 5-15 seconds depending on complexity
   - If you see the 'typing...' indicator in Telegram, the warrior is processing

5. Try a simple message:
   - Send a short message like 'hello' to test the connection
   - Complex queries take longer to process

If none of these work, the AI service may be temporarily unavailable. Wait a few minutes and try again.
Support.resetGatewayBody:
The Gateway is your warrior's connection pipeline between the messaging platform and the AI engine.

When to reset:
- Your warrior stopped responding unexpectedly
- Messages are arriving with long delays
- You're seeing error messages from the bot

How to reset:
1. Go to your Dashboard
2. Find the 'Gateway Status' card in the bottom section
3. Click 'Reset Gateway'
4. Confirm the reset in the dialog
5. Wait 10-15 seconds for the system to reinitialize

A reset clears the message pipeline cache and re-establishes the connection between your messaging channel and the AI engine. Your data (memories, settings, rhythms) is not affected.

After resetting, send a test message to verify everything is working.
Support.trialExpiredBody:
Your free 7-day trial gives you full access to all ClawWarriors features. When it expires:

- Your warrior stops responding to messages
- Pulse Checks and War Rhythms pause
- Your data (memories, settings, conversation history) is preserved

To reactivate:
1. Go to the Upgrade page
2. Choose Pro ($30/month) or Pro Tribe ($50/month)
3. Complete the checkout through Stripe
4. Your warrior reactivates immediately

Nothing is lost when your trial expires. All your customizations, memories, and conversation history remain intact. Once you subscribe, everything picks up exactly where you left off.

Not ready to subscribe? Your account stays active ‚Äî you can come back anytime and upgrade to resume.

Metadata.siteTitle: ClawWarriors ‚Äî Your AI Warrior, Your Rules
Metadata.siteDescription: Deploy personalized AI agents to Telegram and WhatsApp. Pick a warrior, connect your channel, start chatting ‚Äî all in under 5 minutes.
